title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. A, pt. 2504 - Evictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. A, pt. 2504 - Evictions

State Regulations
§ 2504.1 - Restrictions on removal of tenant
§ 2504.2 - Proceedings for eviction-wrongful acts of tenant
§ 2504.3 - Notices required in proceedings under sections 2504.2 and 2504.4(f) of this Part
§ 2504.4 - Grounds for refusal to renew lease and proceed for eviction

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. A, pt. 2504

Statutory authority: L. 1974, ch. 576; L. 1983, ch. 403

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
